original:
See ya, ^P.
Thanks for everything.
translation:
See ya, ^P.
Thanks for everything.

original:
See you later, ^P.
Thank you for your help.
translation:
See you later, ^P.
Thank you for your help.

original:
You're the first challenger we've
had in a long time.
You're the Tamer that came from
West City, right?
You must be a fool... or a coward.
Maybe a blockhead?
Well, which is it? Or perhaps it's
all three?
translation:
You're the first challenger we've
had in a long time.
You're the Tamer that came from
West City, right?
You must be a fool... or a coward.
Maybe a blockhead?
Well, which is it? Or perhaps it's
all three?

original:
I suggest you brace yourself.
Because you see...
North City is on a completely
different level to any other city!
Not a single Tamer here
is a push-over!
You'll be lucky to get past me,
the First Tamer!
translation:
I suggest you brace yourself.
Because you see...
North City is on a completely
different level to any other city!
Not a single Tamer here
is a push-over!
You'll be lucky to get past me,
the First Tamer!

original:
Behold, for I'm the first Tamer to 
ever make it to the Graphics Board 
Continent! Yes, I'm the one who 
made it to Graphics Board North! 
Don't look so surprised!
translation:
Behold, for I'm the first Tamer to 
ever make it to the Graphics Board 
Continent! Yes, I'm the one who 
made it to Graphics Board North! 
Don't look so surprised!

original:
Now that you understand, 
It's time I teach you a lesson!
I'll be the first to beat you,
and the first to end your journey!
translation:
Now that you understand, 
It's time I teach you a lesson!
I'll be the first to beat you,
and the first to end your journey!

original:
W-what's up with you?! Hey!
Aren't I supposed to be the first?!
translation:
W-what's up with you?! Hey!
Aren't I supposed to be the first?!

original:
The first to be beaten, and the 
first to lose, more like!
Hmph! How annoying! I don't need
any pity from someone like you!
translation:
The first to be beaten, and the 
first to lose, more like!
Hmph! How annoying! I don't need
any pity from someone like you!

original:
It's not like I gave it my all just
then, 'cause if I did...
Just know that there's no way I'd
lose to a Tamer like you!
This isn't over, got it!?
Don't forget that!
And to be clear, I'm not running
away, I'm temporarily retreating!
Hmph!
translation:
It's not like I gave it my all just
then, 'cause if I did...
Just know that there's no way I'd
lose to a Tamer like you!
This isn't over, got it!?
Don't forget that!
And to be clear, I'm not running
away, I'm temporarily retreating!
Hmph!

original:
What's that?
You're a Tamer, right??
Then you must know the name of
the Digimon by my side!
If you tell me, I'll allow you to pass!
translation:
What's that?
You're a Tamer, right??
Then you must know the name of
the Digimon by my side!
If you tell me, I'll allow you to pass!

original:
What are you spacing it out for?
Why won't you answer me?!
translation:
What are you spacing it out for?
Why won't you answer me?!

original:
If you're a Tamer, then you must
know this guy's name!
I'm so close to remembering it, so
why aren't you helping me?!
I'll get you to give me the answer,
no matter what!
translation:
If you're a Tamer, then you must
know this guy's name!
I'm so close to remembering it, so
why aren't you helping me?!
I'll get you to give me the answer,
no matter what!

original:
Ah, I lost...

Well, whatever, that's the least of
my concerns right now.
Now, you have to answer me!
What is this Digimon's name?!
translation:
Ah, I lost...

Well, whatever, that's the least of
my concerns right now.
Now, you have to answer me!
What is this Digimon's name?!

original:
What's up with you...
You're no help at all...
Fine, I'll give you some hints! 
Here's hint number one!
'They're great at dancing and 
greedy when it comes to money.'
Hint number two!

'They've been caught selling 
viruses on the black market!'
translation:
What's up with you...
You're no help at all...
Fine, I'll give you some hints! 
Here's hint number one!
'They're great at dancing and 
greedy when it comes to money.'
Hint number two!

'They've been caught selling 
viruses on the black market!'

original:
Ah... but... they're not a bad guy, 
so don't get the wrong idea, ok?
translation:
Ah... but... they're not a bad guy, 
so don't get the wrong idea, ok?

original:
Enough already, just answer me!

What on earth is my partner?!
translation:
Enough already, just answer me!

What on earth is my partner?!

original:
What is this Guard Tamer's 
Partner Digimon?
translation:
What is this Guard Tamer's 
Partner Digimon?

original: WaruSeadramon!
translation: WaruSeadramon!

original: An evil Digimon!
translation: An evil Digimon!

original:
Weren't you listening back there?
I told you they're not a bad guy...
They may be naiive, but they're
not evil!
Alright, I'm gonna ask you again.
translation:
Weren't you listening back there?
I told you they're not a bad guy...
They may be naiive, but they're
not evil!
Alright, I'm gonna ask you again.

original:
..........................

Uhmmm... Uh....?
Waru... Sea... Dramon...?
WaruSea... WaruSea...?
I've heard that somewhere before...
translation:
..........................

Uhmmm... Uh....?
Waru... Sea... Dramon...?
WaruSea... WaruSea...?
I've heard that somewhere before...

original:
So I've definitely met this Digimon
somewhere before, then.
That's what I thought back then,
too...
translation:
So I've definitely met this Digimon
somewhere before, then.
That's what I thought back then,
too...

original:
We first met back on South Bridge,
but...
Both this Digimon and I had lost
our memories at the time.
But somehow, it didn't feel like the 
first time we'd met................
...............................

Anyway, thanks for your help. 
I need to think a bit more.
translation:
We first met back on South Bridge,
but...
Both this Digimon and I had lost
our memories at the time.
But somehow, it didn't feel like the 
first time we'd met................
...............................

Anyway, thanks for your help. 
I need to think a bit more.

original:
If it isn't ^P...
Have you come looking for us?
Don't worry, Yui is here too.

From the moment we were 
abandoned in this cruel world...
I vowed I'd protect her, no matter
what happened.
This is a place where only the
strongest of Tamers can reach...
Therefore, it's currently the
safest place in the Digital World.
translation:
If it isn't ^P...
Have you come looking for us?
Don't worry, Yui is here too.

From the moment we were 
abandoned in this cruel world...
I vowed I'd protect her, no matter
what happened.
This is a place where only the
strongest of Tamers can reach...
Therefore, it's currently the
safest place in the Digital World.

original:
I will not allow anyone near her.
I'll show you... that until now, 
and forevermore...
It will be ME who'll protect her!
WarGrowlmon...!
translation:
I will not allow anyone near her.
I'll show you... that until now, 
and forevermore...
It will be ME who'll protect her!
WarGrowlmon...!

original:
Ready to fight at your command,
my Tamer.
translation:
Ready to fight at your command,
my Tamer.

original:
You're saying you've come 
to rescue us NOW..?
So what were you doing when
Yui was here, shivering in 
fear and crying out for help?!
Where were you THEN?
translation:
You're saying you've come 
to rescue us NOW..?
So what were you doing when
Yui was here, shivering in 
fear and crying out for help?!
Where were you THEN?

original:
I knew you'd come here. I had my
Digimon report on you. 
That's why I sent Digimon to 
test you all. 
But you rejected us, ^P.
And Asuka simply ran away.
That's when I realized... even 
YOU are my enemies!
translation:
I knew you'd come here. I had my
Digimon report on you. 
That's why I sent Digimon to 
test you all. 
But you rejected us, ^P.
And Asuka simply ran away.
That's when I realized... even 
YOU are my enemies!

original:
I see it now! You're all enemies!

Anyone who comes near 
Yui is an enemy!
And I will not allow anyone to 
lay a single finger on her!
translation:
I see it now! You're all enemies!

Anyone who comes near 
Yui is an enemy!
And I will not allow anyone to 
lay a single finger on her!

original:
I see... I knew it, I really am 
useless after all...
I don't have the strength to be
able to protect Yui...
No matter how hard I try,
nothing ever changes...
I just don't know what to do
anymore...
^P, please...
Help Yui...
translation:
I see... I knew it, I really am 
useless after all...
I don't have the strength to be
able to protect Yui...
No matter how hard I try,
nothing ever changes...
I just don't know what to do
anymore...
^P, please...
Help Yui...

original:
She's been like this since just after
we arrived this world.
No matter what I do, she just
won't wake up...
translation:
She's been like this since just after
we arrived this world.
No matter what I do, she just
won't wake up...

original:
You said you've come to rescue us,
didn't you?!
...then please! Help Yui now!
translation:
You said you've come to rescue us,
didn't you?!
...then please! Help Yui now!

original:
Hold on a minute, there!
We heard everything!
translation:
Hold on a minute, there!
We heard everything!

original:
Calm yourself, kid, everything will
be alright. She's in a DigiComa.
It sometimes happens to those 
whose hearts are too pure for this 
world. If we can find some 'Ginseng', 
we can cure her DigiComa instantly!
translation:
Calm yourself, kid, everything will
be alright. She's in a DigiComa.
It sometimes happens to those 
whose hearts are too pure for this 
world. If we can find some 'Ginseng', 
we can cure her DigiComa instantly!

original:
'Ginseng'?!
T-then I'll go look right away!
translation:
'Ginseng'?!
T-then I'll go look right away!

original:
Again, settle down! You're gonna 
look for it... where exactly?
translation:
Again, settle down! You're gonna 
look for it... where exactly?

original:
Trust in WaruSeadramon here's 
memories!
Though of course, the one who
helped restore those memories...
Was none other than ^P♪
translation:
Trust in WaruSeadramon here's 
memories!
Though of course, the one who
helped restore those memories...
Was none other than ^P♪

original:
D-do you really know where we
can find it?!
translation:
D-do you really know where we
can find it?!

original:
You betcha! I remember 
eeeeeeverything now!
It's on a small island nearby
Proxy Port West.
A Digimon called
AncientWisemon lives there.
You can ask them for the medicine.
Having said that...
AncientWisemon is kinda scary...
A bit weird and intimidating.
If anyone is gonna go, it should 
be ^P.
translation:
You betcha! I remember 
eeeeeeverything now!
It's on a small island nearby
Proxy Port West.
A Digimon called
AncientWisemon lives there.
You can ask them for the medicine.
Having said that...
AncientWisemon is kinda scary...
A bit weird and intimidating.
If anyone is gonna go, it should 
be ^P.

original:
What's with the long face? Is it 
about that virus story from earlier?
It was just a misunderstanding!
That was just... uh...
Hey! I worked with the Union as 
a Super Hacker of Justice to 
help save the world from 
destruction, you know!
translation:
What's with the long face? Is it 
about that virus story from earlier?
It was just a misunderstanding!
That was just... uh...
Hey! I worked with the Union as 
a Super Hacker of Justice to 
help save the world from 
destruction, you know!

original:
And back then I was one of the 
Union Tamers who were saved.
If it weren't for this guy, 
I wouldn't be here right now...
translation:
And back then I was one of the 
Union Tamers who were saved.
If it weren't for this guy, 
I wouldn't be here right now...

original:
Exactly, that's how it is.

And I thought I was the one
being fooled!
translation:
Exactly, that's how it is.

And I thought I was the one
being fooled!

original:
Oh, ^P!

Have you found the 'Ginseng' yet?!
translation:
Oh, ^P!

Have you found the 'Ginseng' yet?!

original:
What?! Not yet??
Why not??
But Yui's been stuck like this for 
ages!
translation:
What?! Not yet??
Why not??
But Yui's been stuck like this for 
ages!

original:
Hey now, settle down. Don't get 
yourself so worked up!
translation:
Hey now, settle down. Don't get 
yourself so worked up!

original:
That's right, kid.
Just believe in ^P.
translation:
That's right, kid.
Just believe in ^P.

original:
I'll tell you the location again, so 
listen up, alright?
Your destination is a small island
near Proxy Port West.
There you can ask AncientWisemon
for the medicine.
They're pretty intimidating, so
don't push your luck!
translation:
I'll tell you the location again, so 
listen up, alright?
Your destination is a small island
near Proxy Port West.
There you can ask AncientWisemon
for the medicine.
They're pretty intimidating, so
don't push your luck!

original:
If you just exit this building, and
then go straight...
You'll find the City Gates. Just exit
there and you'll be close!
Good luck!
translation:
If you just exit this building, and
then go straight...
You'll find the City Gates. Just exit
there and you'll be close!
Good luck!

original:
..........................
Please, ^P!
We absolutely must get that
'Ginseng' no matter what!
We believe in you!
translation:
..........................
Please, ^P!
We absolutely must get that
'Ginseng' no matter what!
We believe in you!

original:
Hm?! What business do you have
with me?!
translation:
Hm?! What business do you have
with me?!

original:
You want medicine for DigiComa?
Not again...
If you want it so badly, you can
just take it by force, right?
Just like you did before!
translation:
You want medicine for DigiComa?
Not again...
If you want it so badly, you can
just take it by force, right?
Just like you did before!

original:
It's no use playing dumb!
If you won't make the first move...
Then I will!
translation:
It's no use playing dumb!
If you won't make the first move...
Then I will!

original:
...What? You want the medicine 
to CURE DigiComa?
Not the medicine to cause it...?
translation:
...What? You want the medicine 
to CURE DigiComa?
Not the medicine to cause it...?

original:
I see... my apologies... I thought 
you were Selectors here again...
They use the medicine in order to
render a person unconscious...
translation:
I see... my apologies... I thought 
you were Selectors here again...
They use the medicine in order to
render a person unconscious...

original:
This island was recently attacked
by the Selectors.
I lost a large amount of very 
important medicine to them.
Unfortunately, I ended up mistaking
you for an enemy, too...
Upon closer inspection, it's clear
you're not part of the Selectors.
translation:
This island was recently attacked
by the Selectors.
I lost a large amount of very 
important medicine to them.
Unfortunately, I ended up mistaking
you for an enemy, too...
Upon closer inspection, it's clear
you're not part of the Selectors.

original:
..............................
Very well.
This is the last 'Ginseng' I have.
You may take it.
translation:
..............................
Very well.
This is the last 'Ginseng' I have.
You may take it.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
It's not good for someone to be
in a DigiComa for a long time.
I suggest you hurry.

I pray everything works out.
translation:
It's not good for someone to be
in a DigiComa for a long time.
I suggest you hurry.

I pray everything works out.

original:
Oh, ^P!
Have you got the 'Ginseng'?!
translation:
Oh, ^P!
Have you got the 'Ginseng'?!

original:
I see!
I knew you would, ^P!
translation:
I see!
I knew you would, ^P!

original:
You should use the 'Ginseng' on
the girl right away.
translation:
You should use the 'Ginseng' on
the girl right away.

original:
W-why?!

Nothing happened?!
She's not waking up!
translation:
W-why?!

Nothing happened?!
She's not waking up!

original:
Don't panic, kid.
Just give it time to work.
translation:
Don't panic, kid.
Just give it time to work.

original:
Y...Yui...?

Wake up, Yui! Please...!
translation:
Y...Yui...?

Wake up, Yui! Please...!

original:
Alright!

Yui's awake!
translation:
Alright!

Yui's awake!

original:
Are you OK, Yui?
Do you remember where we are?
Can you say my name?!
translation:
Are you OK, Yui?
Do you remember where we are?
Can you say my name?!

original: Taku...to...
translation: Taku...to...

original:
T-that's it! 
What about your own name...?
translation:
T-that's it! 
What about your own name...?

original: Takuto...
translation: Takuto...

original: It didn't... work...?
translation: It didn't... work...?

original:
Ta...Takuto...
Takuto, Takuto! Takuto!
......................

I'm sorry... I caused you so much
trouble...
translation:
Ta...Takuto...
Takuto, Takuto! Takuto!
......................

I'm sorry... I caused you so much
trouble...

original:
You scared me...!
Looks like the medicine did work...
translation:
You scared me...!
Looks like the medicine did work...

original:
W-what are you saying...
That's embarassing...
I really didn't... do much at all...

Hahahaha...♪
translation:
W-what are you saying...
That's embarassing...
I really didn't... do much at all...

Hahahaha...♪

original:
I could hear you the entire time, 
you know?
You kept telling me, "It'll be alright,
it'll be alright," and stayed with me.
Thank you for everything, Takuto.
translation:
I could hear you the entire time, 
you know?
You kept telling me, "It'll be alright,
it'll be alright," and stayed with me.
Thank you for everything, Takuto.

original:
A...! As I said...! (sniff!)
It- it- it was... no... no big... deal!
(sniff) Buahahahah...♪
translation:
A...! As I said...! (sniff!)
It- it- it was... no... no big... deal!
(sniff) Buahahahah...♪

original:
Take it easy, kid.

You look like you're on the verge
of tears, there.
translation:
Take it easy, kid.

You look like you're on the verge
of tears, there.

original:
My Tamer as not been able to 
'Take it easy' in a very long time.
Rather, he has been fighting tooth
and nail this entire time.
With Yui not waking up, and the
Selectors attacking...
Without a soul in this world he 
could trust...
When we first met, he belived 
everyone was an enemy.
He's probably still struggling 
with that way of thinking, now...
translation:
My Tamer as not been able to 
'Take it easy' in a very long time.
Rather, he has been fighting tooth
and nail this entire time.
With Yui not waking up, and the
Selectors attacking...
Without a soul in this world he 
could trust...
When we first met, he belived 
everyone was an enemy.
He's probably still struggling 
with that way of thinking, now...

original:
Hmmm...

Kid may be small, but he's still
a man, I guess...
translation:
Hmmm...

Kid may be small, but he's still
a man, I guess...

original:
Hey, Takuto... Let's go back,
alright?
To where everyone else is...
translation:
Hey, Takuto... Let's go back,
alright?
To where everyone else is...

original:
^P...

Could you please take us to where
everyone else is waiting?
translation:
^P...

Could you please take us to where
everyone else is waiting?

original:
I'm glad. 
That's a weight off my shoulders.
translation:
I'm glad. 
That's a weight off my shoulders.

original:
Good for you, kid.
And for you too, ^P...
We're gonna stick around here 
a while longer, so...
If you run into any trouble, don't
hesitate to call us, alright?
translation:
Good for you, kid.
And for you too, ^P...
We're gonna stick around here 
a while longer, so...
If you run into any trouble, don't
hesitate to call us, alright?

original: YUIIIIIIIII!
translation: YUIIIIIIIII!

original:
I'm so glad you're okkk!
(snifffffff)
I was so worried about youuu!
(sniff-sniffffffff)
translation:
I'm so glad you're okkk!
(snifffffff)
I was so worried about youuu!
(sniff-sniffffffff)

original:
You're so annoying! 
And gross!
Can't you blow your nose instead
of letting snot drip everywhere?!
translation:
You're so annoying! 
And gross!
Can't you blow your nose instead
of letting snot drip everywhere?!

original:
But I'm so glad to see you two
back safe and sound.
translation:
But I'm so glad to see you two
back safe and sound.

original:
It was thanks to everyone
supporting and helping Takuto!
translation:
It was thanks to everyone
supporting and helping Takuto!

original:
I know a lot has happened, but I'm
glad you can relax now.
Looks like Takuto's unexpectedly
reliable when push comes to shove.
translation:
I know a lot has happened, but I'm
glad you can relax now.
Looks like Takuto's unexpectedly
reliable when push comes to shove.

original:
That's not... true at all...
I was constantly scared...
I had no clue what was going on
around me, and in the end...
I ended up becoming unable to
trust anyone around me...
I'm so sorry, everyone...
translation:
That's not... true at all...
I was constantly scared...
I had no clue what was going on
around me, and in the end...
I ended up becoming unable to
trust anyone around me...
I'm so sorry, everyone...

original:
That reminds me... We know 
what happened with Takuto,
And we found out Yui suffered 
from a DigiComa...
But what on earth caused Asuka to
go all weird earlier...?
translation:
That reminds me... We know 
what happened with Takuto,
And we found out Yui suffered 
from a DigiComa...
But what on earth caused Asuka to
go all weird earlier...?

original:
Hmmm...

I have no clue... I have absolutely
no memories of that time...
I guess I suffered the same as 
what happened to Yui?
After all... my heart is pure too!
translation:
Hmmm...

I have no clue... I have absolutely
no memories of that time...
I guess I suffered the same as 
what happened to Yui?
After all... my heart is pure too!

original:
H-hey, what's up with this change
in atmosphere...?
translation:
H-hey, what's up with this change
in atmosphere...?

original:
While it was similar to DigiComa...
It was also completely different...
It's most likely you became
synchronised with your Digimon...
translation:
While it was similar to DigiComa...
It was also completely different...
It's most likely you became
synchronised with your Digimon...

original: Ummm.. That was... I...
translation: Ummm.. That was... I...

original:
Hmm... call it purity... or maybe
simplicity...?
Or maybe it's just that she has a 
personality similar to a Digimon...?
translation:
Hmm... call it purity... or maybe
simplicity...?
Or maybe it's just that she has a 
personality similar to a Digimon...?

original:
Congratulations!
That was marvelous, ^P!
You've finally managed to defeat
the Champion of North City!
Truly a spectacular effort!

^P, I'm sure you've got
potential to be a powerful Tamer!
You must come to Graphics Board
Central. Everyone's waiting for you!
That is, the strongest Tamers, and 
best Digimon are waiting there!
Farewell!♪
translation:
Congratulations!
That was marvelous, ^P!
You've finally managed to defeat
the Champion of North City!
Truly a spectacular effort!

^P, I'm sure you've got
potential to be a powerful Tamer!
You must come to Graphics Board
Central. Everyone's waiting for you!
That is, the strongest Tamers, and 
best Digimon are waiting there!
Farewell!♪

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Hey, ^P, does this mean...

You've been invited to the
Championship...?
translation:
Hey, ^P, does this mean...

You've been invited to the
Championship...?

original:
The Colosseum's a pretty 
incredible place, right?
Since everyone's safe and sound, 
with nothing else to worry about...
Why not enter the competition 
after all?
translation:
The Colosseum's a pretty 
incredible place, right?
Since everyone's safe and sound, 
with nothing else to worry about...
Why not enter the competition 
after all?

original:
It'd be the ideal place to test your
skills as a Tamer.
You really should go!
translation:
It'd be the ideal place to test your
skills as a Tamer.
You really should go!

original:
After all those battles against the
Selectors,
It's pretty clear that you have
natural talent as a Tamer.
It makes you wonder just how far
those skills can take you, right?
Everyone's keen to see that♪
translation:
After all those battles against the
Selectors,
It's pretty clear that you have
natural talent as a Tamer.
It makes you wonder just how far
those skills can take you, right?
Everyone's keen to see that♪

original:
That Kernel guy seems pretty
hooked on the idea, too.
Why don't you give it a try,
^P?
translation:
That Kernel guy seems pretty
hooked on the idea, too.
Why don't you give it a try,
^P?

original:
Yeah! That's the spirit!

Would it be OK for us to go to 
the Colosseum, too?
translation:
Yeah! That's the spirit!

Would it be OK for us to go to 
the Colosseum, too?

original:
It looks like it's restricted to 
invited Tamers and Digimon only.
But if I can build a link to the 
Graphics Board Continent server, 
I think we should be able to 
watch the competition from here?
translation:
It looks like it's restricted to 
invited Tamers and Digimon only.
But if I can build a link to the 
Graphics Board Continent server, 
I think we should be able to 
watch the competition from here?

original:
That's great! We'll all be cheering
for you!♪
translation:
That's great! We'll all be cheering
for you!♪

original:
I've got no doubt you can win this, 
^P!
translation:
I've got no doubt you can win this, 
^P!

original:
I think so too! Good luck out there,
^P!
translation:
I think so too! Good luck out there,
^P!

original:
Now that that's sorted...
Yui! Takuto!
translation:
Now that that's sorted...
Yui! Takuto!

original:
What's wrong, big bro? What's 
with that weird look on your face?
translation:
What's wrong, big bro? What's 
with that weird look on your face?

original:
You two must be exhausted, right?
You should go take a nap!
I can even sing you a lullaby!
translation:
You two must be exhausted, right?
You should go take a nap!
I can even sing you a lullaby!

original:
I think it'd be impossible to fall
asleep to your voice, Hiroyuki...
That noisy and off-tune voice of 
yours would drive us nuts...
translation:
I think it'd be impossible to fall
asleep to your voice, Hiroyuki...
That noisy and off-tune voice of 
yours would drive us nuts...

original: No excuses! Come on, let's go!
translation: No excuses! Come on, let's go!

original:
Ohhhh big bro, you haven't changed
a bit...!
translation:
Ohhhh big bro, you haven't changed
a bit...!

original:
H-hey, hold on...!

If Yui's going, then I'm going, too!
translation:
H-hey, hold on...!

If Yui's going, then I'm going, too!

original:
It looks like Takuto's finally
back to his old self, isn't he?
translation:
It looks like Takuto's finally
back to his old self, isn't he?

original:
You must be tired too, right? 
Why don't you take a break?
You really saved all of us, after all.
It must have been tough...
Thank you, ^P.

And I'm sure it's not just us 
who're thankful, either.
I'm sure other Digimon and 
Tamers also feel the same♪
translation:
You must be tired too, right? 
Why don't you take a break?
You really saved all of us, after all.
It must have been tough...
Thank you, ^P.

And I'm sure it's not just us 
who're thankful, either.
I'm sure other Digimon and 
Tamers also feel the same♪

original:
Good morning, ^P,
did you sleep well?
translation:
Good morning, ^P,
did you sleep well?

original:
You must have been exhausted.
You were out like a light!
...well, I guess that's not much 
of a surprise, though.
translation:
You must have been exhausted.
You were out like a light!
...well, I guess that's not much 
of a surprise, though.

original:
After everything that happened,
we're all safe and sound.
And it's all thanks to you, all
the trouble you went through...
^P, I want to thank you 
again for everything you did.
translation:
After everything that happened,
we're all safe and sound.
And it's all thanks to you, all
the trouble you went through...
^P, I want to thank you 
again for everything you did.

original:
I gotta thank you for saving Yui and
Takuto, too.
Thanks, ^P.
translation:
I gotta thank you for saving Yui and
Takuto, too.
Thanks, ^P.

original:
Okay, it's time! This is your chance
to show your strength, ^P.
Give it your all at the Colosseum! 
Don't hold back now!
translation:
Okay, it's time! This is your chance
to show your strength, ^P.
Give it your all at the Colosseum! 
Don't hold back now!

original: Yeah! Do your best, ^P!
translation: Yeah! Do your best, ^P!

original:
Asuka and the others have been
waiting for you to wake up.
Be sure to go check on them at
the Entrance later, got it?
translation:
Asuka and the others have been
waiting for you to wake up.
Be sure to go check on them at
the Entrance later, got it?

original:
Hm? Could it be..? You're...
^P...?
Do you remember me? I'm Lumor.
We fought at West City.
translation:
Hm? Could it be..? You're...
^P...?
Do you remember me? I'm Lumor.
We fought at West City.

original:
You know everyone here's 
watching you closely, right?
They say you've got the most 
promise as future World Champion!
But I mean, I knew you were
Champion material all along!
It was pretty easy to tell from
our battle!
I have no doubt you'll make your
way through this...
And earn the rank of 
Platinum Tamer!
translation:
You know everyone here's 
watching you closely, right?
They say you've got the most 
promise as future World Champion!
But I mean, I knew you were
Champion material all along!
It was pretty easy to tell from
our battle!
I have no doubt you'll make your
way through this...
And earn the rank of 
Platinum Tamer!

original:
If you're wondering what's so
special about this Championship...
It's that they're using this 
Colosseum itself, copied from
the system of the original 
Tamer Union!
Here, winning battles repeatedly
raises your Tamer Ranking.
And to get certified and recognised
by the Tamer Union...
That's the ultimate honor for 
a Tamer!
translation:
If you're wondering what's so
special about this Championship...
It's that they're using this 
Colosseum itself, copied from
the system of the original 
Tamer Union!
Here, winning battles repeatedly
raises your Tamer Ranking.
And to get certified and recognised
by the Tamer Union...
That's the ultimate honor for 
a Tamer!

original:
When you're ready to register for
the Championship,
Just talk to Minomon at the
counter over there.
But he won't let you enter if you 
don't have enough Tamer Points.
You've not been assigned a Tamer
Rank yet, have you, ^P?
Okay, then you'll need to win 
the first round...
Do that, and you'll earn your first
rank - Bronze Rank!
translation:
When you're ready to register for
the Championship,
Just talk to Minomon at the
counter over there.
But he won't let you enter if you 
don't have enough Tamer Points.
You've not been assigned a Tamer
Rank yet, have you, ^P?
Okay, then you'll need to win 
the first round...
Do that, and you'll earn your first
rank - Bronze Rank!

original:
You should really go speak to the 
Darkdramon behind the counter too.
I hear you'll be able to receive 
some really cool rewards,
If you win your match and officially
raise your rank!
translation:
You should really go speak to the 
Darkdramon behind the counter too.
I hear you'll be able to receive 
some really cool rewards,
If you win your match and officially
raise your rank!

original:
Oh, and since the matches take place
back-to-back with no breaks, 
Be careful not to waste your MP
while battling, okay?
Make sure to stock up on healing 
items with Pandamon over there, 
And prepare thoroughly before you
head in to your match!
translation:
Oh, and since the matches take place
back-to-back with no breaks, 
Be careful not to waste your MP
while battling, okay?
Make sure to stock up on healing 
items with Pandamon over there, 
And prepare thoroughly before you
head in to your match!

original:
Once you've completed your entry 
for the Championship...
Speak to the Guide Staff, and they
will bring you to the Battle Stage.
translation:
Once you've completed your entry 
for the Championship...
Speak to the Guide Staff, and they
will bring you to the Battle Stage.

original:
I really should warn you, though...

Once you're registered, you can't 
leave the Colosseum until it's over.
If you want to leave the area,
you need to talk to Minomon again.
translation:
I really should warn you, though...

Once you're registered, you can't 
leave the Colosseum until it's over.
If you want to leave the area,
you need to talk to Minomon again.

original: Alright then, good luck out there!
translation: Alright then, good luck out there!

original:
Hi there! This is the Entry Desk for
the World Championship, 
Which doubles as the Tamer 
Ranking Battle Series!
Would you like to challenge the
World Championship?
translation:
Hi there! This is the Entry Desk for
the World Championship, 
Which doubles as the Tamer 
Ranking Battle Series!
Would you like to challenge the
World Championship?

original:
^P! You've gotta help, 
we're under attack by Erasers!
You're a Platinum Tamer, so...
you can save everyone, right?
Right?!
translation:
^P! You've gotta help, 
we're under attack by Erasers!
You're a Platinum Tamer, so...
you can save everyone, right?
Right?!

original:
Would you like to enter Round 1
of the Championship?
translation:
Would you like to enter Round 1
of the Championship?

original: Enter
translation: Enter

original: Don't enter
translation: Don't enter

original:
Would you like to enter Round 2
of the Championship?
translation:
Would you like to enter Round 2
of the Championship?

original: Enter
translation: Enter

original: Don't enter
translation: Don't enter

original:
Would you like to enter Round 3,
the Championship Semifinals?
translation:
Would you like to enter Round 3,
the Championship Semifinals?

original: Enter
translation: Enter

original: Don't enter
translation: Don't enter

original:
Enter the Final Round 
of the Championships?
translation:
Enter the Final Round 
of the Championships?

original: Enter
translation: Enter

original: Don't enter
translation: Don't enter

original:
You're looking for a Rank Up Battle
for higher than Platinum Tamer...?
There seems to be a Rank called
Legend Tamer, but...
No Tamers have entered, and there
are no opponents to fight...
It looks like that rank hasn't been
opened in a very long time.
In other words, even the rank
itself is little more than a legend.
I heard that a legend sleeps on
Archive Island, but...
I don't think anyone knows the 
details behind it...
translation:
You're looking for a Rank Up Battle
for higher than Platinum Tamer...?
There seems to be a Rank called
Legend Tamer, but...
No Tamers have entered, and there
are no opponents to fight...
It looks like that rank hasn't been
opened in a very long time.
In other words, even the rank
itself is little more than a legend.
I heard that a legend sleeps on
Archive Island, but...
I don't think anyone knows the 
details behind it...

original:
Would you like to enter the Rank Up
Battle for Legend Tamer Rank?
translation:
Would you like to enter the Rank Up
Battle for Legend Tamer Rank?

original: Enter
translation: Enter

original: Don't enter
translation: Don't enter

original:
Huh? You're the Legendary Tamer,
^P, aren't you?
You know you can't enter more 
Rank Up Battles here, right?
There's no rank higher than yours, 
after all.
translation:
Huh? You're the Legendary Tamer,
^P, aren't you?
You know you can't enter more 
Rank Up Battles here, right?
There's no rank higher than yours, 
after all.

original:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge Round 1 of the
Championship,
And to take part in the Bronze
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 25,000 Tamer
Points, okay?
translation:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge Round 1 of the
Championship,
And to take part in the Bronze
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 25,000 Tamer
Points, okay?

original:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge Round 2 of the
Championship,
And to take part in the Silver
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 27,500 Tamer
Points, alright?
translation:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge Round 2 of the
Championship,
And to take part in the Silver
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 27,500 Tamer
Points, alright?

original:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge Round 3, the 
Semifinals of the Championship,
And to take part in the Gold
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 37,500 Tamer
Points, got that?
translation:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge Round 3, the 
Semifinals of the Championship,
And to take part in the Gold
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 37,500 Tamer
Points, got that?

original:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge the Final
Round of the Championship,
And to take part in the Platinum
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 57,500 Tamer
Points, you see?
translation:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to challenge the Final
Round of the Championship,
And to take part in the Platinum
Rank Up Battle,
You need at least 57,500 Tamer
Points, you see?

original:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to take part in the
Platinum Rank Up Battle,
The amount of Tamer Points
you need is...
127,500 Points, okay?
translation:
Hm? Looks like you don't have
enough Tamer Points.
In order to take part in the
Platinum Rank Up Battle,
The amount of Tamer Points
you need is...
127,500 Points, okay?

original:
Come again when you're ready
for the challenge, alright?
translation:
Come again when you're ready
for the challenge, alright?

original:
Alright! I'll enter you into the 
system now, okay?
.............................
.............................
Okay, entry processed!

Don't forget, while you're entered 
you cannot exit the Colosseum.
Don't go forgetting now, okay?
translation:
Alright! I'll enter you into the 
system now, okay?
.............................
.............................
Okay, entry processed!

Don't forget, while you're entered 
you cannot exit the Colosseum.
Don't go forgetting now, okay?

original: Good luck!
translation: Good luck!

original:
Huh...?

You'd like to cancel your entry?
translation:
Huh...?

You'd like to cancel your entry?

original:
Would you like to cancel your
entry?
translation:
Would you like to cancel your
entry?

original: Cancel it
translation: Cancel it

original: Don't cancel it
translation: Don't cancel it

original:
Talk to me whenever you want to
cancel your entry, alright?
translation:
Talk to me whenever you want to
cancel your entry, alright?

original:
Okay! I'll cancel your entry right
away...
..............................
..............................
Cancellation processed!

When you want to try again,
just come back here, alright?
translation:
Okay! I'll cancel your entry right
away...
..............................
..............................
Cancellation processed!

When you want to try again,
just come back here, alright?

original: Wait a minute!
translation: Wait a minute!

original:
You can't leave here!

Competitors with upcoming battles
can't exit the Colosseum...
If you want to leave, you've gotta
go cancel your entry, remember?
translation:
You can't leave here!

Competitors with upcoming battles
can't exit the Colosseum...
If you want to leave, you've gotta
go cancel your entry, remember?

original:
The only ones allowed to pass here
and enter the Battle Stage...
Are those Tamers who have
registered for the Championships.
translation:
The only ones allowed to pass here
and enter the Battle Stage...
Are those Tamers who have
registered for the Championships.

original:
It looks like you've signed up for
the Championships.
translation:
It looks like you've signed up for
the Championships.

original: Are you ready to go?
translation: Are you ready to go?

original: Ready to enter the Battle Stage?
translation: Ready to enter the Battle Stage?

original: Let's go!
translation: Let's go!

original: Wait
translation: Wait

original:
Understood.

When you've finished preparing,
just come talk to me.
translation:
Understood.

When you've finished preparing,
just come talk to me.

original: Then please, come this way.
translation: Then please, come this way.

original:
Using this portal, you can make 
your way to the Battle Stage.
Good luck!
translation:
Using this portal, you can make 
your way to the Battle Stage.
Good luck!

original:
This portal is currently in use.
If you want to access the Stage,
Could you please use the portal
on the opposite side?
translation:
This portal is currently in use.
If you want to access the Stage,
Could you please use the portal
on the opposite side?

original:
So you've come, ^P!

Allow me to check your data!
translation:
So you've come, ^P!

Allow me to check your data!

original:
Congratulations! With this, you've
achieved the rank of Bronze Tamer!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!
translation:
Congratulations! With this, you've
achieved the rank of Bronze Tamer!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!

original:
You did it! You got that Silver
Tamer rank in no time!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!
translation:
You did it! You got that Silver
Tamer rank in no time!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!

original:
That's amazing! You've achieved 
the rank of Gold Tamer!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!
translation:
That's amazing! You've achieved 
the rank of Gold Tamer!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!

original:
Incredible! You've finally 
reached Platinum Tamer rank!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!
translation:
Incredible! You've finally 
reached Platinum Tamer rank!
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!

original:
I... can't believe it... You've 
achieved Legend Tamer rank...
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!
translation:
I... can't believe it... You've 
achieved Legend Tamer rank...
Here's a reward from the new 
Tamer Union for your achievement!

original:
Hey, you're already a Legend
Tamer, aren't you?
I don't have anything else to give
you... really, it's your turn now!
translation:
Hey, you're already a Legend
Tamer, aren't you?
I don't have anything else to give
you... really, it's your turn now!

original:
I don't have any rewards to give
you...
Come again some other time...
translation:
I don't have any rewards to give
you...
Come again some other time...

original:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i
translation:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i

original:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i
translation:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i

original:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i
translation:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i

original:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i
translation:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i

original:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i
translation:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^i

original: Well done! Keep it up!
translation: Well done! Keep it up!

original:
Sorry, but we don't have any
rewards for a Novice Tamer.
Come back when you've achieved
Bronze Tamer or higher!
translation:
Sorry, but we don't have any
rewards for a Novice Tamer.
Come back when you've achieved
Bronze Tamer or higher!

original:
This is Pandamon's Item shop!

Need anything?
translation:
This is Pandamon's Item shop!

Need anything?

original:
If you're ever in need of items,
don't hesitate to come back!
translation:
If you're ever in need of items,
don't hesitate to come back!

original:
Here it is! Round 1 of the World
Championships!
The winning Tamer will rank up and
become a Bronze Rank Tamer!
Tamers, please step onto the 
Battle Stage!
translation:
Here it is! Round 1 of the World
Championships!
The winning Tamer will rank up and
become a Bronze Rank Tamer!
Tamers, please step onto the 
Battle Stage!

original:
First we have the Fiery Rookie,
the up-and-coming ^P!
And their opponent will be the
veteran Tamer, Crear!
He's making a special appearance 
as the only Senior Class Tamer!
translation:
First we have the Fiery Rookie,
the up-and-coming ^P!
And their opponent will be the
veteran Tamer, Crear!
He's making a special appearance 
as the only Senior Class Tamer!

original:
You better not have forgotten 
about me, brat!
I may have allowed you the grace of
winning back in East City...
However, I, the King Tamer, will 
not be holding back this time.
Entering this Championship was
a cakewalk!
If you dare to underestimate me,
you're in for a world of hurt!
translation:
You better not have forgotten 
about me, brat!
I may have allowed you the grace of
winning back in East City...
However, I, the King Tamer, will 
not be holding back this time.
Entering this Championship was
a cakewalk!
If you dare to underestimate me,
you're in for a world of hurt!
